# webURL | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ ShazamKit ](/documentation/shazamkit)

- [ SHMediaItem ](/documentation/shazamkit/shmediaitem)

- [ webURL ](/documentation/ShazamKit/SHMediaItem/webURL)

-  webURL 

Instance Property# webURL

A link to the Shazam Music catalog page that contains the full information for the song.iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 8.0+

```
var webURL: URL? { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/ShazamKit/SHMediaItem/webURL#Discussion)

This link opens the Shazam app or App Clip if it’s available on the device.

## [See Also](/documentation/ShazamKit/SHMediaItem/webURL#see-also)

### [Working with Shazam music catalog media items](/documentation/ShazamKit/SHMediaItem/webURL#Working-with-Shazam-music-catalog-media-items)

[`var shazamID: String?`](/documentation/shazamkit/shmediaitem/shazamid)The Shazam ID for the song.[`class func fetch(shazamID: String, completionHandler: (SHMediaItem?, (any Error)?) -> Void)`](/documentation/shazamkit/shmediaitem/fetch(shazamid:completionhandler:))Requests the media item for the song with the specified Shazam ID.
